scripts.sam-package: sam package --template-file template.yml --s3-bucket serverless-signup-packages --output-template-file template-packaged.yml --region eu-west-1
scripts.sam-deploy: sam deploy --template-file template-packaged.yml --stack-name serverless-signup --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-1
scripts.deploy: npm run sam-package; npm run sam-deploy;
